safire.data.frequency_based_transform module¶

class safire.data.frequency_based_transform.FrequencyBasedTransformer(corpus, k, discard_top=0, label=None)[source]¶

Bases: gensim.interfaces.TransformationABC

Provides functionality for retaining only the top K most frequent words in a text corpus.

report_features()[source]¶

Builds a report of the retained features and their frequencies: returns a list of triplets (feature no., feature word, feature freq. in corpus) sorted descending by frequency in corpus.
